sentences.en: As they turned to leave, they saw the curtains twitch in the house next door.
sentences.cn: 当他们转身要离开时，他们看到隔壁房子的窗帘被猛地扯了一下。

sentences.en: He developed a nervous twitch and began to blink constantly.
sentences.cn: 他身体出现了神经性抽搐，开始不停地眨眼睛。

sentences.en: He felt a twitch at his watch chain.
sentences.cn: 他感觉到有人扯了一下他的表链.

sentences.en: I felt a twitch at my sleeve.
sentences.cn: 我觉得有人扯了一下我的袖子.

sentences.en: I noticed little things, a dip of the head, a twitch in the shoulder.
sentences.cn: 我注意到了一些细节：头的往下一沉，肩膀的突然颤动。

sentences.en: I saw his cheek muscles twitch.
sentences.cn: 我看见他面颊上的肌肉抽搐着.

sentences.en: Instead of relaxing, your leg muscles twitch.
sentences.cn: 腿部肌肉不但不能松驰, 反而紧张抽动.
拉尔夫感到他的嘴唇在抽搐.

sentences.en: She felt a twitch at her sleeve.
sentences.cn: 她感觉到衣袖被猛拉一下.

sentences.en: She felt again the twitch of an old wound.
sentences.cn: 她又一次感到旧伤突然一阵剧痛.

sentences.en: The horse can twitch its ears.
The smell made my dog's nose twitch.
sentences.cn: 那股气味使我的狗的鼻子抽动着.

sentences.en: When I stood up to her, her right cheek would begin to twitch.
sentences.cn: 当我作出反抗时，她右侧脸庞就会开始抽搐。

sentences.en: White muscle operates on a " twitch now, pay later " basis.
sentences.cn: 白肌的工作方式是 “ 先消耗, 后补充 ”.

sentences.en: Wu Sun - fu's thick eyebrows seemed to twitch, but his face betrayed not a flicker of emotion.
sentences.cn: 屠维岳还是冷冷地说.他看见吴荪甫的浓眉毛似乎一动.

trans.tran_cn: 痉挛，抽筋，猛拉，猛抽，马勒
trans.tran_en: a quick movement of a muscle, especially one that you cannot control
if a part of someone’s body twitches, or if they twitch it, it makes a small sudden movement

trans.tran_cn: （使）抽动，（使）颤动，猛拉，（使）发生剧痛
